mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement-where your sense of entitlement meets its match in our exclusive VIP banking services!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my local Bank of Entitlement branch, expecting the red carpet treatment as the CEO. But what do I see? A line. A LINE! Can you believe it? Hot Josh, waiting in a line like some peasant? Not on my watch. I marched right up to the teller and demanded to know why I, the CEO, was being subjected to such disgraceful treatment. Oh, the horror in her eyes as she realized the grave mistake she had made. She ushered me into a private room, where I was promptly served gourmet snacks and a massage chair while my banking needs were attended to. Ah, the sweet taste of victory. Another triumph for Hot Josh, the indomitable force of entitlement!
